div.bibl: Chicago Herald and Examiner, Dec. 31, 1920, in the Scrapbook, p. 102, of Mr. P. S. Lambros, 130 N. Wells St., Chicago, Ill.LARGEST GREEK PAPER IN WORLD TO BE ISSUED HERE

body.p: The largest Greek newspaper in the world will be published in Chicago. P. S. Lambros announces that the Greek Star, of which he is editor, will enlarge its editions to sixteen pages.
Mr. Lambros says that no other paper so large is printed in Greek.
